lenders.name: Mari
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help run a program, called Judi's House, where children and their care givers  who have had a death loss can come for free. In a huge old house in a big city I talk to everyone, schedule everything, and make differ for 100 people four nights a week.

lenders.name: Kamil
lenders.occupational_info: investment

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I designed new medical devices.

lenders.name: searra
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do!  It makes me smile to know I am helping someone make their life better...=)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student graduating in the fall with a Social Science degree.  I plan on using this to teach high school students.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I believe in capitalism. I believe that by making low cost capital available to entrepreneurs, small personal economies will change one at a time leading to a great benefit for everyone. Poverty comes from systemic exploitation and a deliberate restriction of capital. We can change that.
lenders.occupational_info: I help internet users find educational furniture and equipment to purchase on my company's website.

lenders.name: CLIFTON CLASSROOM
lenders.occupation: Classroom of Students at Shaughnessy Elementary
lenders.loan_because: We are students who would like to make a difference globally, paying it forward, one step at a time.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: it makes my heart feel good to be able to help someone else as others have helped me.

lenders.name: Erin Rose
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to give back and support inspired ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find homes, and sell their old one. I also teach people how to make money by investing in extra properties so that they have additional cash flow.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: many people have helped me.  I want to pass that on.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: it has a direct positive impact on an individual's life!

lenders.name: Murray
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find homes...

lenders.name: nicki
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people who help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I help large companies integrate their systems with Adobe software

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: So many people in underdeveloped countries have brains and energy and ingenuity and a will to succeed.  All they lack is capital.  That's where I come in. I love helping people to start or grow a business.

lenders.name: AAA Camano Storage
lenders.loan_because: It is my responsibility and privilege to offer others an opportunity to create better lives for themselves through their business.  In my opinion Kiva offers the most efficient and sustainable method to accomplish that end.
lenders.occupational_info: We assist others in storing their extra belongings, household goods and/or business inventory, we also offer truck rental and moving supply sales to the communities we serve.

lenders.name: Carsten
lenders.loan_because: I believe in building a better world step by step

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to connect with and help people across the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an art gallery and I work on my own artwork when I have the time.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I have a lot to be thankful for.
lenders.occupational_info: I make clothing fit properly. I create measurements, grading and patterns that get sent to other countries for production.

lenders.name: gavin
lenders.loan_because: i'm 13 years old, and i've dicovered that your never too young to help someone...
lenders.occupational_info: i mow lawns and help around my relative's houses'

lenders.name: Krista Spyker
lenders.loan_because: To help those much less fortunate than I think I maybe at any given time in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping customers find what they are looking for with a smile on my face.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: "Denouncing evil is a far cry from doing good." - Philip Gourevitch
lenders.occupational_info: Former Kiva intern, permanent Kiva cheerleader. Long live the Donut Empire!

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to empower people and provide them the tools and opportunities to achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people learn how to create income and live their dreams.

lenders.name: HappyMan Creative
lenders.loan_because: As a small businessman myself, I really enjoy the idea that my small efforts can help someone who needs it - no matter where they happen to do business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a illustrator and graphic designer working in the SF Bay Area.

lenders.name: Velays
lenders.loan_because: We like to see spirited people bettering their lives and their communities.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe in micro-lending to help lift people out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I give advice to banks on how to improve their businesses

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I like happy people!

lenders.name: Sonja
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is being alone  with a child even though I live in Germany...
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a little store selling erotic toys, movies and clothes

lenders.name: Ari
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people
lenders.occupational_info: Design websites

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I believe this can work

lenders.name: Retronyms
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: YOUNGJU
lenders.loan_because: It is my honor to be a seed for  prosperity of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my client's management in their improving process, compliance with regulations, etc.

lenders.name: Henry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people have a better life, so they, in turn, may help others. Pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I act and direct in the professional theatre. I teach acting as well.

lenders.name: Bartek
lenders.loan_because:
I know there are places in the world where it takes a lot of courage and creativity to earn the living. 
If there are people out there who want to make a difference for themselves and they are only lacking funds it would be a waste of their energy not to support them:) 
It feels good to help :)

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of our money being used to invest in the development of areas in need of a jump start. It's sent with a purpose and bounces around the local economy, creating opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a part of a team that designs airplanes for airlines around the world.

lenders.name: Adil
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed with the ability to do so. I believe that if we wish to bring more peace and happiness throughout this world, we need to do our best to help those that are less fortunate; and because I'm not yet at a point in my life where I can help on a larger scale, I loan via Kiva.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I received a gift certificate for my birthday.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit Ballet Company

lenders.name: Kathleen and Eric
lenders.loan_because: We feel lucky to have been given a lot of opportunities in our lives, and we'd love to help others be given opportunities to create the lives they want as well.

lenders.name: Wedensday Meditation
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world that brings peace and a better standard of living, and because Kiva is a gift to the world!
lenders.occupational_info: There are 6 members of our meditation Group, we all hold important jobs. 2 of us are beautifully guiding and raising the next generation, 1 works for a newspaper and is a gorgeous step-mother, friend and sister, 1  runs a business and loves yoga, 1 lives her life bringing beauty to the world and is a wonderful Mother and Grand Mother  and 1 is an author and friend of the angels.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to share.

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: The right thing at the right time for the right reasons.
lenders.occupational_info: I support the classroom teacher so they can be better teachers.

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: I believe in providing a hand up rather than a hand out. I respect and admire all those working to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a bookkeeper. I keep track of the money that my employer earns and keep track of what he spends so he can make good business decisions. This keeps the business growing and provides many of my community members with good jobs.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: If's such a blessing to help someone else achieve success.  It's very contagious to keep giving and giving!!
lenders.occupational_info: Our ministry shows the love of God by helping those in need with food assistance and limited financial assistance.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to give back.

lenders.name: Sydney
lenders.loan_because: that's how I roll.  :P

lenders.name: Manuel
lenders.loan_because: it's just.

lenders.name: Carine
lenders.loan_because: I have been to Ghana and I am passionate about doing what I can to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that publishes educational books and online resources for university and college students.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do.

lenders.name: TAKAHIRO
lenders.loan_because: Peace&Natural Mind

lenders.name: Allan & Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I like to help alleviate poverty especially in war-torn countries. This gives others a chance to start or expand their businesses, giving them a decent livelihood and their families a better future.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: If I can help someone get started, I consider that the best way to use my money.  My hope is that someday the people I help will be in a position to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university professor.  I specialize in cross-cultural psychology and my passion is teaching.  Once again, if I can help someone get started...in this case with a solid understanding of other cultures...then my time on this planet has been well spent.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in someone else's life and help them improve their livelihood.
lenders.occupational_info: I can't work because I had a car accident 8 years ago and now I'm in a wheelchair.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel like a better person. Everybody should do it. We're not all lucky.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a university student and I work one shift a week at a fast food store half an hour away. I am hoping to one day become a primary school teacher so that I can also teach them the value of giving to others.

lenders.name: Gracie
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a very real and effective way to make a difference to many people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business development manager for a boutique fashion label.

lenders.name: Dominique
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance in life.

lenders.name: ania
lenders.loan_because: i am able to

lenders.name: geoff
lenders.loan_because: i can!
lenders.occupational_info: i look after the kids befor school

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: reading about these people makes me realise just how lucky I am and good fortune is only worth something if it is shared.
lenders.occupational_info: work at living happily

lenders.name: Tarlee
lenders.occupational_info: i have 3 children i care for

lenders.name: Ami
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand in life
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently completing my honours degree at university

lenders.name: Pily and Gerry
lenders.loan_because:
i want to give something back. 
There have been alot of people out there who have helped me and i want to "pay it forward"
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in a bank, helping people decide what accounts to open and what is best for their situation.
I also help people get loans through the bank to buy houses, cars or whatever they need the loan for.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get ahead and make ideas possible when cash is scarce.
lenders.occupational_info: I sew costumes and evening wear, and I run my own small business.

lenders.name: jodie ward
lenders.loan_because: i want to give someone the opportunity to improve their lives and also those around them. Educate children and to improve living conditions for those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: my husband runs a small business and I help him. I am also a mother to 3 young boys which keeps us busy.

lenders.name: www.EtaVisa.com
lenders.loan_because: What a beautiful world it would be if we all helped each other.

lenders.name: Kelly-anne
lenders.loan_because: Have always felt a need to help people less fortunate than me.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people to help themselves, in a productive and sustainable manner.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a businessman who wants to make a difference. Attitude is everything.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: Becuase I am better off than alot of other people in the world, I believe everybody should have a chance at having a good life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently on a disability pension. I suffer from a lung illness called Cystic Fibrosis. I also study tourism.

lenders.name: vankemenade family
lenders.loan_because: i want to help
lenders.occupational_info: i love being a mum, my daughter is autisic and i love her the way she is.. and that how i see life . love and give..

lenders.name: Clara and Matt
lenders.loan_because: We believe we need to form a global community where people take care of each other and feel bound together regardless of ethnicity and religion.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I feel like I am helping someone in need, to make their life and the lives of their family and community better.
lenders.occupational_info: Fulfilling.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: its an absolute privilege to be able to give something to help someone else.  A recent trip to Kenya was a life changing experience, can't wait to go back.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize a small number of workers from our home office, doing plumbing work on peoples homes. Fixing taps and toilets and broken pipes etc.

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: sometimes people just need to be given the chance to soar.. :-)

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I care about people and want good opportunities for people who are less fortunate than myself.

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand sometime in their life!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother to 4 children - that speaks for itself.

lenders.name: Vesta
lenders.loan_because: Because at the end of the day we are all human beings - and that is all that we are.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.occupation: Teacher but now a mum at home
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy way for me to help someone else.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: It's right

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: To be able to help others is a wonderful thing. Kiva offers a wonderful service & I cannot recommend highly enough.

lenders.name: Rhiannon
lenders.loan_because:
I would rather use my savings to help change peoples lives for the better than assist a bank in increasing their already enormous profits.
What better gift to give than to enable someone to be empowered to change their own destiny and have bright hopes for the future.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a Nickel mine in outback Western Australia. I issue permits for maintenance personnel to ensure work on machinery is done safely.

lenders.name: douglas
lenders.loan_because: giving for food is not enough, giving so they can fend for themselves makes sense to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I search for old shipwrecks

lenders.name: Lyndal & Alex
lenders.loan_because: there is never a bad time to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: helping people with illness or disability makes the most of their skills through rehabilitation, changing the task process or by changing the environment to suit them.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate that i can
lenders.occupational_info: i work in a university library shelving books.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I am passionate about giving to those less fortunate. I am also passionate about liberating women and assisting them to gain the freedom to live their lives.

lenders.name: Alisha
lenders.loan_because: everybody needs a helping hand
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying Primary education

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I was just so happy to hear about Kiva-what a magnificent idea-helping others to enable them to earn a decent living & thereby support their families/communities. Hooray!
lenders.occupational_info: My husband & I have been growers of field-grown trees for 27 years. We have also built our home (log cabin), sheds etc from timber grown & harvested from our property, & also milled here. My husband is also a very keen woodcrafter/inventor, so, the idea of helping these entrepeneurs appeals.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I can.      I want to try to make a difference in people's lives.  I have benefitted from an education and life opportunities that I could only have dreamed of as a younger person.    Lending with Kiva is one of the most exciting things I have ever done.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a family counsellor with the parent carers (and other members of a person's network) of people diagnosed with cancer.   I also work in liaison with a major University to promote social work research in the oncology setting.

lenders.name: SUZANNE
lenders.loan_because: WE CAN ALL DO A LITTLE TO HELP EACH OTHER
lenders.occupational_info: I'M A FULLTIME  CARER FOR MY HANDICAPED DAUGHTER AND MY YOUNG SON

lenders.name: Jeremiah
lenders.loan_because: I am evil.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because:
I know that my money is worth a lot more in some other countries so if I can help some other people achieve their goals, why not?! 
 Also, to have some great ideas & not be able to put them into action due to lack of money is very frustrating (I know how that feels too!) & so I like to support entrepreneurial people. Good luck  Isha, Shamil & Mohommad!
lenders.occupational_info:
My work involves doing surveys with people in order to glean certain information, or simply to find out how people are feeling about a specific product. This is called market research - researching a market for a given purpose. I work for quite a few different market research companies, whose clients can be anyone from a bank to a soft drink company. Having said that, I hope to be more entrepreneurial in the future!
Having said that, I'm hoping to set up an ebay business of my own & am researching this on my own time at the moment, as I would rather work for myself - so yes, I'm a budding entrepreneur too!
And sorry about the lack of photo - I just bought a decent digital camera, so hopefully you'll be seeing one soon.....

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I think it's a fantastic idea.  I like the idea of being able to assist someone to achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with intellectually disabled adults in a group home.  I help them to learn skills, and become part of the community

lenders.name: jody
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic idea and i just would love to be apart of it.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.occupation: Property Investor and a Health Researcher
lenders.loan_because: If you think you can, you CAN! If you think you can’t, you’re right. If you think you can do something, you’ll find a way to do it. You will turn obstacles and failures into learning experiences for your growth. Challenges then become something you can work through and learn from. Similarly, if you think you can’t do something or that failing is bad, you will let these very same challenges stop you. You will point to them as the reasons why you won’t succeed. Because successful people exist on the leading edge of thought and innovation, they run up against more challenges than the average person. They have many more failures than most because they’re always going for it. They don’t let themselves be stopped by challenges, and neither should you.
lenders.occupational_info: Peter and I have been married for almost 27 years and we have 3 children aged 26, 24 and 14 years old...LIFE is a journey...Not a destination...I am enjoying the journey with my family and HAPPY to help in a small way others to enjoy their lives through the benefits of micro finance....simply LOVE that we have the opportunity to loan through Kiva...

lenders.name: Moni & Mad
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: Students - go to school

lenders.name: Paula & Adam
lenders.loan_because: We were always telling our son to appreciate how lucky he was compared to others in the world and thought it was about time we did something to help instead of just sitting back & doing nothing.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Love that I can help people with similar interests to myself that are less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: As well as full time Mum, I love to motivate people to get fit and healthy.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people who are less fortunate than myself.

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others and be apart of changing the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell ready made meals to people

lenders.name: Jacquie
lenders.loan_because: I am very lucky to live in a country like Australia.  Although I am not wealthy, I live very comfortably compared to people in many other countries and I want to try and help others have a better standard of living.  I think Kiva is a fantastic idea, and I especially like the fact that it allows people to come together and just by giving a little help make a real difference to the lives of the people who receive these loans.  Everyone deserves a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked at the University of Melbourne since 1990.  My job is to help staff and students.  At the moment I manage a department that trains paediatric doctors and nurses.

lenders.name: Singing Nuns
lenders.loan_because: It gives me a feeling of satisfaction to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I have an entertainment group who raise money to help children with cancer.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I am a blessed person living in a fantastic Country, I have nothing to worry about compared to most of the people on this website, If everyone gives a little then it can make a massive dfference
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Mother, a wife and a hairdresser

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I know that a small amount of my money can make a big difference in the lives of people overseas and I love helping others share my success
lenders.occupational_info: I'm changing the way businesses treat their customers by raising the standard of customer service starting in Melbourne

lenders.name: Renate
lenders.loan_because: We need to help each other to create love and trust in the world, and make the world better for all people.
lenders.occupational_info: I advertise for work in construction and then i hire tradespeople to do the work.

lenders.name: Kylie
lenders.whereabouts: Far North Coast New South Wales

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help give other people a chance at improving their quality of life and build a better future for themselves and their communities.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: It is a small way in which I can help my fellow beings improve and enrich their lives. Giving not only helps others but it gives me a fantastic feeling of community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am someone who listens to people with problems and helps them to find ways of solving those problems. My main interest lies with children with behavioural and sleep problems.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I am an active volunteer and my friends created my initial Kiva account as a gift for my 70th birthday.  They thought it would be a perfect way to extend my volunteer interests... they were right!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I retired from my career as a corporate attorney 13 years ago and since then have had an active life as a volunteer principally in areas of children"s literacy both in my home city and abroad.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: from little things..big things grow.
lenders.occupational_info: contemporary artwork

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I live in the lucky country and want to share with others
lenders.occupational_info: I live and work on our family farm, we grow crops such as wheat, barley, canola & hay and also have merino sheep and 2 steers!

lenders.name: jodi
lenders.loan_because: God loves people and this is a fantastic way to be his hands and feet!
lenders.occupational_info: Mum of 3 little ones aged 2, 6 and 8. Married to a wonderful man, Love Jesus, Love singing, Am an Emergency Nurse at a major Melbourne hospital.

lenders.name: Allyson
lenders.loan_because: Their are many people worse off than me and little bit given helps. I admire women who try to overcome their financial position.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students (teenagers).

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: This has to be the best way to give a hand up. The money keeps coming back so I can use it over and over. Its brilliant! So grateful to the KIVA staff.
lenders.occupational_info: I work from my home computer

lenders.name: Kyli
lenders.loan_because: no matter how small a contribution, and in any form, it makes a difference.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies manage their finances.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: Auditor

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I do Admin at a Theme Park.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: WHY NOT HELP SOMEONE ELSE
lenders.occupational_info: Livestock accounting

lenders.name: Regan
lenders.loan_because: Its the least I can do
lenders.occupational_info: Helping to heal

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people create a better life for themselves and their families and achieve their dreams

lenders.name: Luke
lenders.loan_because: I like this idea & i think it can really make a difference
lenders.occupational_info:
I run the wait staff in a restaurant.
I enjoy my work & take great pride in it

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: the fact that I can afford to spend a little bit of extra money on something like this means I can help do something meaningful for someone who has to struggle to survive every day. Everyone should do this :)

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because:
The gift of giving, is a gift that keeps giving - just pass it on and pay it forward - 
It feels amazing to help someone who you will never meet, and never speak to, who will never say Thank You, but you just know lending on KIVA feels right.
lenders.occupational_info: Owner of a Wholesale Fashion Jewellery Business. I have been running my own Mail order business for over 10 years.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: it matters
lenders.occupational_info: cooking wide range of cuisine eg Australian, Asian,French

lenders.name: Norma
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the health and wellbeing of my own family.  I appreciate the opportunity and being able to support people who are working hard for their own families, often in very difficult circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a large team of specialist teachers who provide support services to students with Vision, Health, Hearing and Learning difficulties in all the government schools in our region.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to do better for themselves, their families and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a doctor for horses. I appreciate people who work and care for livestock. I hope that everyone treats these animals with respect and cares for them to the best of their ability. The better the animals are treated, the more productive they will be.

lenders.name: Pauline
lenders.loan_because:
"If you give a man a fish you feed him for a day. if you teach a man to fish you feed him for a lifetime"
Old Proverb
lenders.occupational_info: I help young children with disabilites in their swimming and water safety programs

lenders.name: Chris & Branko
lenders.loan_because: It's time to give back
lenders.occupational_info: Branko's work makes sure power/energy gets to people's homes and companies.  Chris' work makes sure computers work.

lenders.name: June
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to try to "level the playing field" while allowing people to retain their self-respect and pride.
lenders.occupational_info: I sort mail in the morning, but am semi-retired (which means I have time, at last, to read lots of books)

lenders.name: Darriel
lenders.loan_because: opportunities are to be passed on once given to you.
lenders.occupational_info: I write to share stories.

lenders.name: Leo
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a moral issue to help those who want to change their lives and just need a little investment capital to get them moving along
lenders.occupational_info: I help communities provide clean renewable energy with solar and wind. We help build off grid water pumping systems and provide high efficiency lighting.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I recieved a small loan when I was young and together with hard work it helped me become prosperious today.
lenders.occupational_info: Testing oil and gas pipes and tanks to ensure safety and plan maintenance.

lenders.name: Team Hewitt
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is better to give than to receive.  I also believe that work helps people to move forward and out of an unfortunate poverty cycle.
lenders.occupational_info: Help within the school classroom or office.

lenders.name: Sonja
lenders.loan_because: what seems like a small amount to us in developed countries will help small business owners in developing countries empower themselves and provide a livelihood for their families.

lenders.name: GLORIA

lenders.occupational_info: I have my own financial planning business in Perth. I advise people how to look after their money so thath they can save for their retirement.  I also give advice on personal insurances.

lenders.name: Tim & Teresa
lenders.loan_because: Fulfilling dreams is what life is all about. Helping others fill theirs. helps me fill mine. Peace.

lenders.name: Bel, Grace & Olivia
lenders.loan_because: It's simple and effective, it hopefully will be sustainable and teach persistance, resourcefulness and resiliance
lenders.occupational_info: We take books into our store, give the person credit for them, the amount depending on the type and quality of the books, and they can use that credit to reduce the cash price of the books in the shop by up to 70%. They can choose whether they want to keep the books they buy forever, or return them after they have read them and receive 40% of the normal cash price of the book back again in store credit. For example if a person received the full 70% discount a $9.95 book becomes a purchase of only $3, if they return the book in good condition they recieve $4 in store credit to use on the next book purchase.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: GOD has blessed me with  being  able to give to bless others. When we loan rather than give a hand out it empowers others then perhaps one day they will have the oppertunity to pass it on
lenders.occupational_info: i have recently returned from a mission trip to Kempala and Lira, Uganda. I really enjoyed working with the young people  over there

lenders.name: Kez
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out.
lenders.occupational_info: Aged Care

lenders.name: Helen and Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I think the concept is outstanding, giving the recipients the opportunity to support themselves, and so they're not just accepting charity, giving them self respect which is incredibly deserved. It's a fantastic idea, and once this loan is repaid we will lend the money to another deserving person.
lenders.occupational_info: I am disabled and sometimes sell jewellery on Ebay. My son Ryan is a student and is very enthusiastic about lending money to help someone start to support themselves.

lenders.name: Selena
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference to others!
lenders.occupational_info: I own a motorcycle rental and tour business in Sydney.  I also have a motorcycle clothing business for women.

lenders.name: Kowboyy
lenders.loan_because: want to help.

lenders.name: Bethanie
lenders.occupational_info: I am a fulltime mother. The best job in the world! Fortunately my husband is a carpenter and this allows me the privelege to stay home and raise our son.

lenders.name: Barry
lenders.loan_because: I know people are not as lucky to be born in Australia as I was

lenders.name: Fiona
lenders.loan_because: I am very lucky as I have shelter, my children are happy, healthy, and never go hungry.  I have a wonderful husband who supports me in what I do and I wish to give someone else the same opportunities that my children take for granted.

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: I believe the principle of paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage projects to make changes to computer systems...and make sure they still work after we change it... or at least that is what I do when I work...right now I am a stay at home Mum to baby Joshua :)

lenders.name: Sasha & Yogi
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky to be borne in a country where I had better posibilities and i am happy that I might be able to make a difference to somebodies life.

lenders.name: kelly
lenders.loan_because: We share the worlds resouces unfairly and i have enough for my family so i like to share with others to help them grow and take care of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: i look at peoples health and try to find out why some people get sick  or diseased and why other people  who are the same, dont.

lenders.name: melaine
lenders.loan_because: we all want to care for those around us.  if we can help people do this we will.
lenders.occupational_info: we try to love and care for people around us

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: I live in Australia and had have many wonderful opportunities in life and am fortunate enough to be in a position where I can contribute
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Travel/Tourism student

lenders.name: Meagan
lenders.loan_because: From little things big things grow.

lenders.name: Spida
lenders.loan_because: After my Heavenly Father above my family is the most important part of my life...  Why not help someone who loves and wants a future for thier FAMILY... I wish them all the luck.
lenders.occupational_info: Where i am in life today I Thank Our Heavenly Father above Our LORD JESUS CHRIST for his Love and Forgiveness XxX

lenders.name: Mark Field
lenders.loan_because: I have spent considerable time in the back blocks of Malaysia and Borneo and have experienced first-hand the spirit of these rural areas.  I am very inspired by the dedication to family and community that a lot of these villagers display and have invested some of my money and a whole lot of my encouragement to support my brothers and sister in other parts of the world.  Let's all keep up the good work ...and continue to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Mrs Dabbs
lenders.loan_because: To help less fortunate people to have a better life
lenders.occupational_info:
Volunteer worker for Birds Australia.
To conserve and research birds in the wild

lenders.name: The Elliott Family
lenders.loan_because: we want to teach our children the value of helping others who are in need and trying to make a go of it for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people who are injured, disabled or in pain to rehabilitate and improve their function.

lenders.name: Serani
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I can.  I cannot ignore that I would not miss $25 but to another person it can change their world.
I am very involved in Animal Rights and already donate to Greenpeace and ChildFund but I wanted to give money to women who make a difference to the lives of their families.  I am really excited about Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a Neonatal and Paediatric Intensive Care Registered Nurse in Australia.   I care for babies who are born up to 16 weeks early and also critically ill children up to the age of 14 years.
I am happily partnered by an awesome woman and we have 4 beautiful daughters between us.  My life is blessed!

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I'm thrilled to be able to help make a difference in someones life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to work in one of the best restaurants in Sydney.

lenders.name: Merrilyn
lenders.loan_because: a small positive action can make such a difference.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I care and because i know that micro finance and empowering women is how to end global poverty.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Seva
lenders.loan_because: ... I like to give people the opportunity to keep up their livelihood with proud and dignity. The idea of kiva is great!
lenders.occupational_info: I am managing customer projects within a large IT company.

lenders.name: Lyn
lenders.occupation: mum who works from home & home schools

lenders.name: Marianna
lenders.loan_because: I think it is such a worthwhile thing to help someone who is willing to try to improve their lives and just need a little hand. It is fantastic to see loans being repaid and then loaning again.  More positive than just a donation.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small tour agency that provides services in Italy.  I love what I do as it allows me to help people really experience their time in Italy and get the most out of their trip.

lenders.name: Shaun and Sharyn
lenders.loan_because:
One person can be a positive change in someones life!

We want to help the impoverished.

We want to contribute to this world we share.

lenders.name: Vinh
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themself, to make a little better life for themself, and better world for somebody out there.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because:
To keep that circulation of energy and opportunity
open to everybody across the globe
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother to 3 boys

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: We should all help one another
lenders.occupational_info: I work with troubled children and adolescents

lenders.name: Den & Ivica
lenders.loan_because: We cannot help everyone but everyone can help someone

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: It's frustrating waiting for the governments of first world countries to prioritise helping those in need.  Poverty and preventable diseases in third world countries should be a thing of the past.   I loan directly because I know every dollar goes to where it's needed rather than being lost in administration and red tape.
lenders.occupational_info: I am raising three beautiful girls in Sydney, Australia

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I want to pass on some of my good fortune in life to others.
lenders.occupational_info: As a nurse and a teacher, I care for people and pass on information to them-compassion and education are important . Even though life has been difficult for me at times , I appreciate how lucky I am to live where I do.

lenders.name: Jeanene
lenders.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to help others

lenders.name: Jaycie
lenders.loan_because: I want to start giving back because i have been fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: I work at In N Out Burger as a manager.

lenders.name: Cecilia
lenders.loan_because: It is the least I can do to help fight poverty worldwide. Because charity is all very well, but only temporary relief. These microcredits are long-term help: you help people set their own business and become economically independent. Because everybody deserves a chance and it's a shame that so many millions of people will never have one because they lack access to capital for an initial investment. Because I want to be the change I want to see in the world.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: we are given blessings in life that we should pass on.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in television taping programs from the satellite.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference and leave a legacy that lasts after I am gone. I believe that money is not everything but it can change everything. I am a follower of Jesus Christ and He gave it all so that I can be free to give.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: I like to make life a little bit easier for those that need it.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: it's more than a handout. It's empowering people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a government department that assists people with disabilities with managing their finances.

lenders.name: Vijay
lenders.loan_because:
Its really hard time for me. Here in india, day by day we r suffering from cost rais. Life became costy. Emplyment doesnt work to fulfil daily life requirement here. 
  Want to do software bussiness for that i would like to buy some resources for which i am not capable. So want a loan.
 I have diffrent conecpts to on which i have to work to make softwares. i.e. profit tracking system etc. I will offord free copy of my one useful daily expense tracking software to those who helps me in this task.
lenders.occupational_info: information technilogy

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: It's lovely to see the person and know the story behind the request and I feel empowered by being able to select  the person I loan to.

lenders.name: Sheryl
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed and provided for me so I can bless and help others.  Deuteronomy 15:6 When the Lord your God blesses you as He promised you, then you shall lend to many nations, but you shall not borrow.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of elderly people so they can remain in their own homes as long as possible.

lenders.name: Zalvina
lenders.loan_because: There are many things about this world that I would change, but changing the world is no easy task and certainly not something that can be accomplished by any single person. I figure that together with a group of likeminded individuals who all share the same vision of a better world in which all people can live harmoniously, happily and most importantly, equally, we trully can create positive change in the world; one loan at a time!

lenders.name: miranda
lenders.loan_because:
It's fun! 
"Be the change you want to see in the world..." Ghandi

lenders.name: Frans
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who try to get a better life by starting their own business

lenders.name: Kylie
lenders.loan_because: Empowerment is so important!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a National Operations Manager

lenders.name: Norm & Dee

lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I no longer "work" for a living. We are "retired".

lenders.name: Denice & Martin

lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good that I can make a difference. I don't make too much money but enough to be able to help someone else no matter how small my donation is.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a taxi driver. I don't have to describe my work too much. All taxi drivers around the world do practically the same thing. :)

lenders.loan_because: I'm doing this for selfish reasons...it feels good.  I'm sure it makes the entrepreneur proud to repay the loan and it gives me great pleasure to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a stay at home mum of 3.  I work from home  for my husband's welding business doing all the bookkeeping.

lenders.name: kym
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is such an awesome tool to assist other small business owners world wide.   We can make a difference one loan at a time.

lenders.name: The Tsangs

lenders.occupational_info: I work for an education research non-profit whose goal is to ensure that every child in the US has a well-qualified teacher.

lenders.name: Kandice
lenders.loan_because: As an artist, I know how hard it is even in the best of circumstances to build and maintain a business for yourself.  I can't even image trying to do it with the circumstances the people here are experiencing.  I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I make beads out of glass with a torch, using a technique called lampworking.

lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to have as much as I do, and want to help others to have a better life. It's my way of saying "Thank You!"

lenders.occupational_info: I listen to people dealing with issues in their life and work with them to find ways through their problems.

lenders.loan_because: I know that banks' conditions are very hard so this is the way how to start the small business.

lenders.name: Janna
lenders.loan_because: between us all, we can truly make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I do fundraising and financial work for a non-profit land conservation organization.

lenders.name: Sheryl
lenders.loan_because: To help women improve their lives and those of their children.

lenders.loan_because: I do believe it makes a difference.

lenders.loan_because: I help because I can

lenders.loan_because: I heard how this organisation helped 3rd world countries and it appealed to me that you help others help themselves.

lenders.occupational_info: I work at growing awareness in our community about the International School of Minnesota.  I believe education will be the salvation of us all.

lenders.name: Alexandra

lenders.occupational_info: I am a pastor and I work mostly with teenagers.

lenders.occupational_info: I sell natural cosmetics and pure essential oils and also work in the field of natural therapies.  I also do psychic readings

lenders.name: Lizzie

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I like to see real change in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I make websites.

lenders.name: Brad

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want people to experience hope in places that were previously without it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help tell people in my town about our community events and causes.  I help to raise awareness for charities and the arts.

lenders.name: Carla

lenders.whereabouts: Puerto de la Cruz Santa Cruz de Tenerife

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: I'm a huge advocate of giving back to the greater community and this is another way to make an impact. It's not just about taking advantage of what the world can provide in the present - it's about preserving and enhancing it for the future!

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Charlie
lenders.loan_because: It is time we all make an effort to give back to those in need. It lets the sunshine  back in between your ears. Thank you Kiva for this unique format to be Givers.

lenders.name: Christer
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Kloriece
lenders.occupation: Sell my arts and crafts online
lenders.loan_because:
I am blessed with enough money that my family is secure and I wish everyone could be safe and secure.
This in my effort to help this happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I create items from discarded clothing, paint on reclaimed paper, knit and crochet with scrap yarn in an effort to keep items in use instead of thrown away.  My mother used to say, "Waste not, want not."

lenders.name: Jodi Schoenauer
lenders.loan_because: Philanthropy is central to a good life and well being. It benefits the doner far more then the recipent
lenders.occupational_info: I help raise money for different charities. I also went on a mission to Peru where we did surgery on 114 children with facial deformities.

lenders.name: Neelley
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people use their skills so that they become role models to others in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm part of a program that helps United Methodists think about ways they can change the world by building community locally & fighting malaria globally.

We are grade sevens who want to help people all over the
> world because we come from all over the world, too

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I want to be the change I wish to see in the world

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: The bread which you withhold belongs to the hungry; the clothing you shut away, to the naked; and the money you bury in the earth is the redemption and freedom of the penniless. -Thomas Aquinas

lenders.name: Winston and Tina
lenders.loan_because:
I want to make a difference in the world. Every one deserves the chance to earn the dream, if they are willing to work for it.
If you can dream it, you can achieve it

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: it is important to give back to the world around me.
lenders.occupational_info: i work in a cancer research institute assisting the doctors with administrative tasks

lenders.name: Larissa
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I build web sites.

lenders.name: norma

lenders.occupational_info: I teach children aged 9 and 10 how to read, write and do math and art. I hope that I teach them to be citizens of the world.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate to have the quality of life that I do. I lend because I wish to help others achieve a higher quality of life.

lenders.name: Ralph, Mizuho & Fina
lenders.loan_because: the world has to change. This is one way we can help doing it.

lenders.name: Geraldine
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to help and I love the idea of Kiva  :-)

lenders.name: Pelto family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people be happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive a truck and deliver packages, and my wife takes care of our home and children.  Our children do well in school, so we hope they will have good jobs when they are grown.

lenders.name: Nigel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make it.

lenders.name: axel
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: Carri
lenders.loan_because: 1) Redistribution of wealth/knowledge to aid those who request it is important for me 2) Kiva provides an efficient way to participate in a global grassroots societal self-help initiative 3) It solves my utility maximization problem :)

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: It's the best I can do right now.
lenders.occupational_info: Studying for medical school

lenders.name: Rex Boni
lenders.loan_because: Beggars who walk, princes and queens who ride, in skull-and-bone land saunter side-by-side.  Equality.  Ob arm ob reich im Tode gleich.

lenders.name: Frédéric
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good way to help people by developing job and activity.

lenders.name: Arne
lenders.loan_because: It's an investment in the future
lenders.occupational_info: Office work, I develop web sites based on a CMS

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because:
J'étais un volontaire de corps de la paix au Benin et je voudrais aider les gens là-bas.
I was a Peace Corps volunteer in Benin and I would like to help the people there.

lenders.name: Dave Galliguez
lenders.loan_because: I read book "Banker to the Poor" by  Mohammed Yunus and believe in the micro-lending process to help people sustainable "fish" for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I create links... between webpages, ideas and people.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Karl
lenders.loan_because:
To quote Antoine de Saint Exupery  "If you want to build a ship, don't drum up the men to gather wood, divide the work and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea..."

I truly believe that it is essential for the people of this world to work together,in order to bring about any positive change.
Our help not only enables but also encourages people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I believe by giving entrepeneurs a leg up rather than a hand out they have a vested interest to make a difference and with our help they will!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Education for Sustainable Development and I manage a Field Centre.  I have spent 32 years in education working as a Biologist teaching environment education to teachers and students all ages.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: Grow your business and you will succeed! Stop growing and you will become dormant! I help because I know how hard it is to run a small business and succeed.Keep on growing Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: Small Photography / Video Production Company.

lenders.name: John and Leanne
lenders.loan_because: There are so many people in the world who don't have the opportunities that we take for granted in Australia. Every Australian has the chance to "make a go of it". That is simply not the case in so many other countries.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with the ability and support in order to get a good education and a good job. Many other people could do what I do if they had the resources I do, but they can't because of circumstances out of their control. I want to share what God has given me with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to be an actuary. Actuaries look at information about losses in the past in order to predict what losses will be in the future. This is so insurance companies can make sure they charge the right price for insurance and set aside enough money to be able to pay for all of the future claims.

lenders.name: Nitesh
lenders.loan_because: I studied economics and journalism in college -- through that I discovered microlending.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Chicago-based Internet news company.

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: it's 100x better than the sting of buyer's remorse after buying something that doesn't really benefit anyone.  That and I like to feel that I'm helping someone reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a union that ensures that actors receive adequate compensation for the work they do.
